description: After the battle, Tart appears in front of Love. According to Tart, she is the legendary warrior, Precure, who has to stop Mobius` ambition. Love is shocked upon hearing this. Tart tells Love that they need to find the other three Precure. Meanwhile, Miki encounters a vending machine-like Nakewameke, and transforms into Cure Berry through the use of the Blun to protect her brother.

titles.title: Freshly-Gathered Fresh! Cure Berry Is Born!!
つみたてフレッシュ! キュアベリー誕生!!
